casebody.data:
TAYLOR v. DECATUR MINERAL & LAND CO. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. June 2, 1902.) No. 1,115. Appeal from the Circuit Court of the United States for the Northern District of Alabama. Milton Humes, for appellant. Lawrence Cooper, for appellee.

Before PARDEE and McOORMICK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Without concurring fully in all the reasons given by the learned judge of the circuit court, we are satisfied that the decree rendered by him was correct, and the same is affirmed.
